typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Flight#} as integer,
		Origin as string,
		Dest as string,
		FlightDate as date 'dd-MM-yyyy',
		NoSalesReason as string,
		TransmittingFlightAttd as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> RIMHistSrc
RIMHistSrc filter(NoSalesReason=='Other') ~> FilterReason
FilterReason aggregate(NoSalesReason = Count()) ~> MS186104Cnt
FilterReason sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MS186104_RIMHist_Tgt'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Target
MS186104Cnt sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[''],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MS186104Tgt2
